Browse the source code of qtbase-6.5.0/src/3rdparty/harfbuzz-ng/src/OT/glyf/path-builder.hh

1#ifndef OT_GLYF_PATH_BUILDER_HH
2#define OT_GLYF_PATH_BUILDER_HH
3
4
5#include "../../hb.hh"
6
7
8namespace OT {
9namespace glyf_impl {
10
11
12struct path_builder_t
13{
14 hb_font_t *font;
15 hb_draw_session_t *draw_session;
16
17 struct optional_point_t
18 {
19 optional_point_t () {}
20 optional_point_t (float x_, float y_) : has_data (true), x (x_), y (y_) {}
21 operator bool () const { return has_data; }
22
23 bool has_data = false;
24 float x = 0.;
25 float y = 0.;
26
27 optional_point_t lerp (optional_point_t p, float t)
28 { return optional_point_t (x + t * (p.x - x), y + t * (p.y - y)); }
29 } first_oncurve, first_offcurve, last_offcurve, last_offcurve2;
30
31 path_builder_t (hb_font_t *font_, hb_draw_session_t &draw_session_)
32 {
33 font = font_;
34 draw_session = &draw_session_;
35 first_oncurve = first_offcurve = last_offcurve = last_offcurve2 = optional_point_t ();
36 }
37
38 /* based on https://github.com/RazrFalcon/ttf-parser/blob/4f32821/src/glyf.rs#L287
39 See also:
40 * https://developer.apple.com/fonts/TrueType-Reference-Manual/RM01/Chap1.html
41 * https://stackoverflow.com/a/20772557
42 *
43 * Cubic support added (incomplete). */
44 void consume_point (const contour_point_t &point)
45 {
46 bool is_on_curve = point.flag & glyf_impl::SimpleGlyph::FLAG_ON_CURVE;
47#ifdef HB_NO_CUBIC_GLYF
48 bool is_cubic = false;
49#else
50 bool is_cubic = !is_on_curve && (point.flag & glyf_impl::SimpleGlyph::FLAG_CUBIC);
51#endif
52 optional_point_t p (font->em_fscalef_x (v: point.x), font->em_fscalef_y (v: point.y));
53 if (!first_oncurve)
54 {
55 if (is_on_curve)
56 {
57 first_oncurve = p;
58 draw_session->move_to (to_x: p.x, to_y: p.y);
59 }
60 else
61 {
62 if (first_offcurve)
63 {
64 optional_point_t mid = first_offcurve.lerp (p, t: .5f);
65 first_oncurve = mid;
66 last_offcurve = p;
67 draw_session->move_to (to_x: mid.x, to_y: mid.y);
68 }
69 else
70 first_offcurve = p;
71 }
72 }
73 else
74 {
75 if (last_offcurve)
76 {
77 if (is_on_curve)
78 {
79 if (last_offcurve2)
80 {
81 draw_session->cubic_to (control1_x: last_offcurve2.x, control1_y: last_offcurve2.y,
82 control2_x: last_offcurve.x, control2_y: last_offcurve.y,
83 to_x: p.x, to_y: p.y);
84 last_offcurve2 = optional_point_t ();
85 }
86 else
87 draw_session->quadratic_to (control_x: last_offcurve.x, control_y: last_offcurve.y,
88 to_x: p.x, to_y: p.y);
89 last_offcurve = optional_point_t ();
90 }
91 else
92 {
93 if (is_cubic && !last_offcurve2)
94 {
95 last_offcurve2 = last_offcurve;
96 last_offcurve = p;
97 }
98 else
99 {
100 optional_point_t mid = last_offcurve.lerp (p, t: .5f);
101
102 if (is_cubic)
103 {
104 draw_session->cubic_to (control1_x: last_offcurve2.x, control1_y: last_offcurve2.y,
105 control2_x: last_offcurve.x, control2_y: last_offcurve.y,
106 to_x: mid.x, to_y: mid.y);
107 last_offcurve2 = optional_point_t ();
108 }
109 else
110 draw_session->quadratic_to (control_x: last_offcurve.x, control_y: last_offcurve.y,
111 to_x: mid.x, to_y: mid.y);
112 last_offcurve = p;
113 }
114 }
115 }
116 else
117 {
118 if (is_on_curve)
119 draw_session->line_to (to_x: p.x, to_y: p.y);
120 else
121 last_offcurve = p;
122 }
123 }
124
125 if (point.is_end_point)
126 {
127 if (first_offcurve && last_offcurve)
128 {
129 optional_point_t mid = last_offcurve.lerp (p: first_offcurve, t: .5f);
130 draw_session->quadratic_to (control_x: last_offcurve.x, control_y: last_offcurve.y,
131 to_x: mid.x, to_y: mid.y);
132 last_offcurve = optional_point_t ();
133 /* now check the rest */
134 }
135
136 if (first_offcurve && first_oncurve)
137 draw_session->quadratic_to (control_x: first_offcurve.x, control_y: first_offcurve.y,
138 to_x: first_oncurve.x, to_y: first_oncurve.y);
139 else if (last_offcurve && first_oncurve)
140 {
141 if (last_offcurve2)
142 draw_session->cubic_to (control1_x: last_offcurve2.x, control1_y: last_offcurve2.y,
143 control2_x: last_offcurve.x, control2_y: last_offcurve.y,
144 to_x: first_oncurve.x, to_y: first_oncurve.y);
145 else
146 draw_session->quadratic_to (control_x: last_offcurve.x, control_y: last_offcurve.y,
147 to_x: first_oncurve.x, to_y: first_oncurve.y);
148 }
149 else if (first_oncurve)
150 draw_session->line_to (to_x: first_oncurve.x, to_y: first_oncurve.y);
151 else if (first_offcurve)
152 {
153 float x = first_offcurve.x, y = first_offcurve.y;
154 draw_session->move_to (to_x: x, to_y: y);
155 draw_session->quadratic_to (control_x: x, control_y: y, to_x: x, to_y: y);
156 }
157
158 /* Getting ready for the next contour */
159 first_oncurve = first_offcurve = last_offcurve = last_offcurve2 = optional_point_t ();
160 draw_session->close_path ();
161 }
162 }
163 void points_end () {}
164
165 bool is_consuming_contour_points () { return true; }
166 contour_point_t *get_phantoms_sink () { return nullptr; }
167};
168
169
170} /* namespace glyf_impl */
171} /* namespace OT */
172
173
174#endif /* OT_GLYF_PATH_BUILDER_HH */
175
